document.title: SP532 Trees to Plant In Containers or Wells

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Landscaping in a small area is challenging, but popular. Planting trees in small areas can limit root and shoot development. Proper selection of plant material for small areas is important to ensure a healthy environment for the plant. Sidewalks, patios, decks, entrances, courtyards and other small areas can be landscaped with the use of containers or wells with restricted soil area.
